channel.title: [PI] PlayerSave,Java
channel.description:
Was adding slayer point and donor point but when u get the points and u log off, you lose ur points.
here is my player save for slayer points:
[code]characterfile.write("slayer-Points = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.slayerPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.slayerPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();[/code]
and
[code] } else if (token.equals("slayer-Points")) { p.slayerPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);[/code]
can anyone tell me what the 12 means in this:
[code] characterfile.write("slayer-Points = ", 0, 12);[/code]
thanks.

item.title: [PI] PlayerSave,Java
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Change the 12 to 16 itâ€™s the amount of spaces in the variable.
